mapper.sql: ID, CANDIDATE_NAME, UNIT, POSITION, POSITION_LEVEL, CANDIDATE_TYPE, ADJUST_TYPE, ASPIRING_UNIT, ASPIRING_POSITION, ASPIRING_POSITION_LEVEL, SEX, BIRTHDAY, DEPARTMENT, ORGANIZATION, NOTE, MEETING_DATE, HOST, DUE_NUMBER, ACTUAL_NUMBER, SUMMARY_NUMBER, APPROVAL_TYPE, REPLY_DATE, CANDIDATE_NUMBER, WRITTEN_DATE, WRITTEN_RESULT, WRITTEN_RANKING, INTERVIEW_DATE, INTERVIEW_RESULT, INTERVIEW_RANKING, THESIS_DATE, THESIS_RESULT, THESIS_RANKING, SYNTHESIS_RESULT, SYNTHESIS_RANKING, TO_DATE(CREATION_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATION_TIME, TO_DATE(UPDATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') UPDATE_TIME, TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_CANDIDATE_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: ID, CANDIDATE_NAME, UNIT, POSITION, POSITION_LEVEL, ADJUST_TYPE, ASPIRING_UNIT, ASPIRING_POSITION, ASPIRING_POSITION_LEVEL, NOTE,SYNTHESIS_RANKING,CANDIDATE_NUMBER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_CANDIDATE_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_CANDIDATE_INFO where TYPE= 1 and ID not in (SELECT DISTINCT B.USERID FROM SYS_FLOW B)

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SYS_CANDIDATE_INFO where TYPE= 0 and ID not in (SELECT DISTINCT B.USERID FROM SYS_FLOW B)
